Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw two students using a device to communicate over a distance.
The student can clearly show the string telephone connecting the two students.
The student can include detailed labels or images indicating that the device uses sound to send information.
The student can effectively use the provided materials, such as cups and string, to show the construction of the string telephone.
The student can clearly represent how the string telephone helps the students communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate that people depend on devices like string telephones to communicate when far apart, possibly including other examples of communication devices.
CANNOT: There are no significant elements the student cannot show, but minor inconsistencies might exist, such as slightly uneven lengths of the string (natural variation).
